rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with storage space and Vastu aligned design to promote auspicious energy.
Spacious living area adjacent to the central courtyard, ensuring natural light and ventilation in accordance with Kerala architecture principles.
Functional kitchen with proper ventilation and a view of the courtyard, adhering to local building norms.
Compact yet efficient guest bathroom aligned with Vastu guidelines for cleanliness and energy flow.
Spacious bedroom featuring a balcony that overlooks the central courtyard. The room is designed with Kerala-style wooden detailing and ample natural light.
Secondary bedroom also includes a balcony facing the open courtyard, ensuring privacy and adherence to traditional design elements.
Cozy library integrated into the farmhouse. The area is designed for quiet reading with Vastu-informed placement to enhance focus and serenity.
Dedicated service space including storage, utility closet, and a small laundry area. It ensures smooth functionality within the floor plan.

openings.location: South-facing to maintain favorable energy flow according to Vastu principles.
Central opening leading to the courtyard, ensuring connectivity with all rooms.
Attached to both main bedrooms for direct access to the balcony areas.

openings.description: Multiple windows strategically placed in each room to enhance natural ventilation and lighting.

budget_notes: Optimized for a tight budget by focusing on multi-functional spaces and local materials. Design incorporates cost-effective solutions while preserving traditional Kerala aesthetics.

vastu_alignment.courtyard_positioning: Centrally located for maximum energy flow and connectivity.
